name: Runewriters Game
description:
(read the comic it's based on at http://www.runewriters.com/ ; light spoilers in the game)

Your necromancer got lost. Have him follow you to his friend so they can go on.

hint1 : you can climb on the pots to get on the roof of buildings.

hint2 : you're smaller than the necromancer, you can pass through places he can't.

(this is an early alpha version; I'm planning on continuing it later on)

made with javascript (using phaser), spring 2017
